sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"教，教育，培养"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: teach, instruct, educate, coach, train, tutor
means: teach ： 最普通用词，含义广泛。指直接教某人知识或技能等，侧重传播知识和帮助应用知识。
instruct ： 与teach含义很接近，但语体较正式。指系统、详细、精心地传播知识，侧重教授与指示。
educate ： 较正式用词，指教育，内容比teach广泛，侧重动机或结果，或对潜在能力的开发。
coach ： 指对个人或小组等进行辅导、训练或补课。
tutor ： 指进行个别教学或课外辅导。

sentence.Network_en: We should instruct the passengers what customs regulations are.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们应该向乘客说明海关规则是什么.

sentence.Network_en: You can instruct your bank to allow a third party to remove money from your account.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以通知银行，允许第三方从你的账户取款。

sentence.Network_en: She came on every ride herself, the better to instruct her eager pupils.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一个骑乘项目她都要亲自试一试，以便更好地指导她那些跃跃欲试的小学生。

授_百度百科 ... (5) 任命[ appoint] (7) 传授[ instruct;teach] (10) 通“受”。接受[ accept].

list.abs: 戴尔中文技术支持网站-论坛 ... Install 安装 Instructions 使用说明 Inverter 变极器.
电梯专业英语词汇（三） ... instructed person 受过训练的人员 instruction 指示，指令 instruction drawing 要领图.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): from Latin instruct- 'constructed, equipped, taught', from the verb instruere, from in- 'upon, towards' + struere 'pile up'

entry.def: If you instruct someone to do something, you formally tell them to do it.

example.ex: The family has instructed solicitors to sue Thomson for compensation...
example.tran: 那家人已经指示律师起诉汤姆森,要求赔偿。

example.ex: 'Go and have a word with her, Ken,' Webb instructed...
example.tran: “肯,去和她谈谈吧,”韦布吩咐道。

entry.def: Someone who instructs people in a subject or skill teaches it to them.

example.ex: He instructed family members in nursing techniques.

sentences.sentence: "He instructed me in building a boat"

means.word_mean: 2. give instructions or directions for some task;

sentences.sentence: "She instructed the students to work on their pronounciation"
"Have the students been apprised of the tuition hike?"

auth_sentence.content: Instruct the captain to draw every play on the ground.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instruct the captain to draw every play on the ground.

auth_sentence.content: Instruct students and visitors on the use of the analytical equipment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instruct students and visitors on the use of the analytical equipment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instruct students and visitors on the use of the analytical equipment.

auth_sentence.content: Or instruct the broker to write a cheque to a rival.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or instruct the broker to write a cheque to a rival.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or instruct the broker to write a cheque to a rival.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏

de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 基础,下部结构,地下建筑

de坏+stroy=struct建立,结构→v.破坏,摧毁,消灭

ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
re再+construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]→v.重建,再建;重现,再现
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

Sentence.sentence: Were they tuned off because an American had the nerve to instruct Japanese in their own art form or they deliberately tried to signal their rejection of her?
in one study, people who were instructed to think about money before entering a cafe spent less times chatting with the other patrons and more time working.
Were they tuned off because an American had the nerve to instruct Japanese in their own art form or they deliberately tried to signal their rejection of her?

sentences.en: The union issued an order instructing its members not to work overtime.
sentences.cn: 工会发出指示, 不让会员超时工作。

sentences.en: The captain instructed the soldiers to retreat.
She instructs music once a week at a middle school.
sentences.cn: 她在中学每周教一次音乐课。

sentences.en: My agent has instructed me that you still owe me ￡50.
sentences.cn: 我的代理人通知我, 你还欠我50英镑。

sentences.en: We should instruct the passengers what customs regulations are.
sentences.cn: 我们应该向乘客说明海关规则是什么。

jushi.english: The sergeant was instructing the soldiers.
My agent has instructed me that you still owe me ￡50.
